body:
#### PR description:

Part of #31061. 
Profited to modernize the code:

   * made `TrackInfoProducer` an `edm::stream::EDProducer`

#### PR validation:

It compiles.

title: modernize `AnalysisAlgos/TrackInfoProducer`
